t: Darwin’s Grip Skeptics | Lawn Care Forum
s: I've been using the DG for 2 yrs. now on an Echo 2620T. Today while cutting heavy overgrown weeds and grass I switched my hand from the DG to factory grip. Immediately I had to slouch forward from the waste. It felt so awkward I really don't know how I survived the previous 33 yrs. with the...
